sourcesContent:
import React, { createContext, useState, useContext } from 'react';

const translations = {
  en: {
    calendar: 'Calendar',
    view: 'View',
    dayView: 'Day View',
    calendarView: 'Calendar View',
    language: 'Language',
    addTask: 'Add Task',
    taskCategory: 'Task Category',
    taskTitle: 'Task Title',
    taskDescription: 'Task Description',
    startingTime: 'Starting Time',
    endingTime: 'Ending Time',
    priority: 'Priority',
    recurringTask: 'Recurring Task',
    add: 'Add',
    edit: 'Edit',
    delete: 'Delete',
    save: 'Save',
    cancel: 'Cancel',
    allInstances: 'All Instances',
    justThisOne: 'Just This One',
    confirmAction: 'Confirm Action',
    recurringOptions: 'Recurring Options',
    frequency: 'Frequency',
    interval: 'Interval',
    endDate: 'End Date',
    preview: 'Preview',
    thisTaskWillRepeat: 'This task will repeat',
    every: 'every',
    until: 'until',
    on: 'on',
    day: 'day',
    week: 'week',
    month: 'month',
    year: 'year',
    days: 'days',
    weeks: 'weeks',
    months: 'months',
    years: 'years',
    low: 'Low',
    medium: 'Medium',
    high: 'High',
    critical: 'Critical',
    priority: 'Priority',
    work: 'Work',
    personal: 'Personal',
    school: 'School',
    changeLanguage: 'Change Language'
  },
  es: {
    calendar: 'Calendario',
    view: 'Vista',
    dayView: 'Vista Diaria',
    calendarView: 'Vista de Calendario',
    language: 'Idioma',
    addTask: 'Añadir Tarea',
    taskCategory: 'Categoría de Tarea',
    taskTitle: 'Título de Tarea',
    taskDescription: 'Descripción de Tarea',
    startingTime: 'Hora de Inicio',
    endingTime: 'Hora de Fin',
    priority: 'Prioridad',
    recurringTask: 'Tarea Recurrente',
    add: 'Añadir',
    edit: 'Editar',
    delete: 'Eliminar',
    save: 'Guardar',
    cancel: 'Cancelar',
    allInstances: 'Todas las Instancias',
    justThisOne: 'Solo Esta',
    confirmAction: 'Confirmar Acción',
    recurringOptions: 'Opciones de Repetición',
    frequency: 'Frecuencia',
    interval: 'Intervalo',
    endDate: 'Fecha de Fin',
    preview: 'Vista Previa',
    thisTaskWillRepeat: 'Esta tarea se repetirá',
    every: 'cada',
    until: 'hasta',
    on: 'en',
    day: 'día',
    week: 'semana',
    month: 'mes',
    year: 'año',
    days: 'días',
    weeks: 'semanas',
    months: 'meses',
    years: 'años',
    low: 'Baja',
    medium: 'Media',
    high: 'Alta',
    critical: 'Crítica',
    priority: 'Prioridad',
    work: 'Trabajo',
    personal: 'Personal',
    school: 'Escuela',
    changeLanguage: 'Cambiar Idioma'
  }
};

const LanguageContext = createContext();

export const LanguageProvider = ({ children }) => {
  const [currentLanguage, setCurrentLanguage] = useState('en');

  const t = (key) => {
    return translations[currentLanguage][key] || translations['en'][key] || key;
  };

  const changeLanguage = (lang) => {
    setCurrentLanguage(lang);
  };

  return (
    <LanguageContext.Provider value={{ currentLanguage, changeLanguage, t }}>
      {children}
    </LanguageContext.Provider>
  );
};

export const useLanguage = () => {
  const context = useContext(LanguageContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error('useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider');
  }
  return context;
};
